thought.text: The issue is that `setuptools.dep_util` was removed in newer versions of setuptools. Let me try to fix this by using an alternative approach. For now, let me try to work around this by directly importing the necessary modules:

action.command: cd /tmp/tmpfe5scn8o/astropy && python -c "import sys; sys.path.insert(0, '.'); import astropy.wcs.wcsapi"
